text:
Hi Pedram,
How are you? 
I have heard this podcast and am trying to get intouch with the DNeg compositors Judy Barr and Alice Mitchel. I am not sure as an outsider I can get through to them, it is always near to impossible to hear from anyone working in post via emails to the company. I did want to find out for even roto part-time...as they say itâ€™s quite common at DNeg.
